entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon then 30 percent chance of drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:18 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
